author: IGN
description:
Metal Gear Solid 3, Yakuza 0, Red Dead Redemption 2, what is the best video game prequel of all time? Let's find out.

Prequel games often benefit from better technology and development tools, making them visually and technically more impressive than their predecessors. But truly great prequels aren’t just remembered for how they look or play, but by how they transform the way we experience the original games we fell in love with and add to the stories we already hold dear. 

With that in mind, the following prequels were chosen not just for their technological and gameplay achievements, but because they forever changed the way we look at some of our favorite characters and worlds. That extra chance to develop and deepen what we already hold dear means some games on this list are even considered the best in their entire series. So without further ado, here are the 10 best video game prequels ever made.

#IGN #MetalGearSolid #RedDeadRedemption
title: Top 10 Best Video Game Prequels, Ranked

author: IGN
description:
After beating the initial Room 46 puzzle in Blue Prince, there is more to discover on the grounds of Mount Holly as you uncover new clues about the estate’s secrets. Here’s where to find the two hidden blue doors and how to solve the late-game puzzles that unseal them.

00:00 - Intro
01:02 - Unlock the Blackbridge Grotto (Permanent Addition)
01:48 - Use A New Clue to Find the Microchips and Throne Room
04:23 - Unlock the Satellite Dish (Permanent Addition)
08:16 - How to Find the Tunnel Blue Door
15:49 - How to Unseal the Blue Doors
21:26 - Rewards Behind the Blue Doors
24:23 - Outro

For more Blue Prince secrets, check out our Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/blue-prince

#IGN #Gaming
title: Blue Prince: How to Find and Unseal the Blue Doors (What to Do After Room 46)

author: IGN
description:
Before The Avengers, the X-Men, and Spider-Man, there was Marvel’s first family, a group of characters who’ve been re-imagined several times. But when it comes to their movies, something’s usually amiss. Created by artist Jack Kirby and writer Stan Lee, the Fantastic Four have been a mainstay of Marvel comics since the company’s inception in 1961, up to and including major crossover events like the 2015 Secret Wars, the basis for its own Avengers crossover. So why didare the Fantastic Four go, OH for four on the big screen before arriving in the MCU? Why was it so hard to make a good Fantastic Four movie?

With Pedro Pascal and Vanessa Kirby leading a new iteration with The Fantastic Four: First Steps into the MCU, they're entry is pretty clearly the strongest. But it's worth looking in to 20th Century Fox and the old days of Comic Book movies that even pre Captain America Chris Evans couldn't save. When it comes to Reed Richards Mr. Fantastic, Sue Storm The Invisible Woman, her broth
title: Why Was It So Hard to Make a Good Fantastic Four Movie?

author: IGN
description:
If Battlefield 6 isn’t launching on your PC due to SecureBoot errors, you need to check and adjust some settings on your PC. This usually involves changing settings in your BIOS menu which can be a little daunting. In this video, we’ll show you a step by step guide on how to enable SecureBoot. This guide will also work for enabling SecureBoot for other games as well.

Timestamps:
00:00 - Intro
00:19 - What is Secure Boot
00:38 - 1: Verify Secure Boot State and BIOS Mode
01:08 - 2: Check Disk Partition Style
01:37 - 3: Convert Disk from MBR to GPT (if required)
02:32 - 4: Enable Secure Boot in BIOS
03:36 - Outro

#IGN #GAMING
title: How to Enable SecureBoot for PC (for Battlefield 6)
